 Cstd::hash< OpenXLSX::XLCellValue >
 COpenXLSX::IZipArchiveThis class functions as a wrapper around any class that provides the necessary functionality for a zip archive

 COpenXLSX::XLCellAn implementation class encapsulating the properties and behaviours of a spreadsheet cell
 COpenXLSX::XLCellIterator
 COpenXLSX::XLCellRangeThis class encapsulates the concept of a cell range, i.e. a square area (or subset) of cells in a spreadsheet
 COpenXLSX::XLCellReference
 COpenXLSX::XLCellValueClass encapsulating a cell value
 COpenXLSX::XLCellValueProxyUsed for proxy (or placeholder) objects for XLCellValue objects
 COpenXLSX::XLColor
 COpenXLSX::XLColumn
 COpenXLSX::XLCommand
 COpenXLSX::XLContentItem
 COpenXLSX::XLDateTime
 COpenXLSX::XLDocumentThis class encapsulates the concept of an excel file. It is different from the XLWorkbook, in that an XLDocument holds an XLWorkbook together with its metadata, as well as methods for opening, closing and saving the document.
The XLDocument is the entrypoint for clients using the RapidXLSX library.
 COpenXLSX::XLFormulaEncapsulates the concept of an Excel formula. The class is essentially a wrapper around a std::string
 COpenXLSX::XLFormulaProxyThe XLFormulaProxy serves as a placeholder for XLFormula objects. This enable getting and setting formulas through the same interface
 COpenXLSX::XLQuery
 COpenXLSX::XLRelationshipItemAn encapsulation of a relationship item, i.e. an XML file in the document, its type and an ID number
 COpenXLSX::XLRowRepresent a row in an Excel spreadsheet. Using XLRow objects, various row formatting options can be set and modified
 COpenXLSX::XLRowDataIteratorThis class encapsulates a (non-const) iterator, for iterating over the cells in a row
 COpenXLSX::XLRowDataProxyThe XLRowDataProxy is used as a proxy object when getting or setting row data. The class facilitates easy conversion to/from containers
 COpenXLSX::XLRowDataRangeThis class encapsulates the concept of a contiguous range of cells in a row
 COpenXLSX::XLRowIterator
 COpenXLSX::XLRowRange
 COpenXLSX::XLXmlDataEncapsulates the properties and behaviour of the .xml files in an .xlsx file zip package. Objects of the XLXmlData type are intended to be stored centrally in an XLDocument object, from where they can be retrieved by other objects that encapsulates the behaviour of Excel elements, such as XLWorkbook and XLWorksheet
 ▼COpenXLSX::XLXmlFileInterface for derived classes to use. It functions as an ancestor to all classes which are represented by an .xml file in an .xlsx package
 ▼COpenXLSX::XLSheetBase< XLChartsheet >
 COpenXLSX::XLChartsheetClass representing the an Excel chartsheet
 ▼COpenXLSX::XLSheetBase< XLWorksheet >
 COpenXLSX::XLWorksheetA class encapsulating an Excel worksheet. Access to XLWorksheet objects should be via the workbook object
 COpenXLSX::XLAppPropertiesThis class is a specialization of the XLAbstractXMLFile, with the purpose of the representing the document app properties in the app.xml file (docProps folder) in the .xlsx package
 COpenXLSX::XLContentTypesThe purpose of this class is to load, store add and save item in the [Content_Types].xml file
 COpenXLSX::XLProperties
 COpenXLSX::XLRelationshipsAn encapsulation of relationship files (.rels files) in an Excel document package
 COpenXLSX::XLSharedStringsThis class encapsulate the Excel concept of Shared Strings. In Excel, instead of havig individual strings in each cell, cells have a reference to an entry in the SharedStrings register. This results in smalle file sizes, as repeated strings are referenced easily
 COpenXLSX::XLSheetThe XLAbstractSheet is a generalized sheet class, which functions as superclass for specialized classes, such as XLWorksheet. It implements functionality common to all sheet types. This is a pure abstract class, so it cannot be instantiated
 COpenXLSX::XLSheetBase< T, >The XLSheetBase class is the base class for the XLWorksheet and XLChartsheet classes. However, it is not a base class in the traditional sense. Rather, it provides common functionality that is inherited via the CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) pattern
 COpenXLSX::XLWorkbookThis class encapsulates the concept of a Workbook. It provides access to the individual sheets (worksheets or chartsheets), as well as functionality for adding, deleting, moving and renaming sheets
 COpenXLSX::XLZipArchive
